title: Triangular WatchFace
summary: Simple minimalistic Android Wear watchface with playful animations.
description: Simple, colorful watchface with animations for your Android Wear device.It has a minimalistic background with simple animation options.The color palette and other options are configurable on the wearable and in the companion app. Displays time and date plus the battery level of the wearable in non-ambient mode.Can display seconds with configurable animation direction as well.Supports 12 hours display.Open-source project, source code available at https://github.com/rycus86/TriangularWatchFace
descriptionHTML:
Simple, colorful watchface with animations for your Android Wear device.

It has a minimalistic background with simple animation options.
The color palette and other options are configurable on the wearable and in the companion app.
Displays time and date plus the battery level of the wearable in non-ambient mode.
Can display seconds with configurable animation direction as well.
Supports 12 hours display.

Open-source project, source code available at https://github.com/rycus86/TriangularWatchFace
comments: Beautiful watchface. Would really like to see customization for colors!!!
Miss Cheryl Dedman Loved this app so simple to use and lovely colours :)
The best watch face there is. Great animation and very stylish. I would love to see more watch faces like this
Truly excellent watch face, would love to see some more colors (or even customizable ones)!
Astonishing! The best watch I have used so far.

Easily one of the best I have hunted high and low for a good watch face worth the money. This one may be free but is easily worth more than most that charge as it's smooth, animated, clear and useful. And it doesn't destroy your battery.
